
RSBE01
Smash Bros Brawl (US)

Enable Random Expansion Stages v1.1 [Phantom Wings]:
* C26B7A6C 00000005
* 3860001F 2C120000
* 41820008 3860000A
* 7C101800 41800008
* 38000001 7C800379
* 60000000 00000000
This code causes every stage to be included in the random stage select, regardless of what is selected in the random stage select screen.
You can disable this; in that case, the added stages will not be chosen on Random.

Unrestricted Pause Camera
* 040A7D60 4E800020
* 04109D88 38800001

Unrestricted Replay Camera
* 0409E934 60000000
* 0409E93C 60000000
* 0409E9AC FC201890
* 0409E9B8 FC600090
* 0409E9BC FC000890
* 0409E9C8 FC001890

Unrestricted Control Editing [spunit262]
* 211973CC 7CC6F82E
* 051973CC 38C20060
* 05197468 38620060
* 05197574 38820060
* 05197680 38E20060
* 051976B4 38620060
* 051978CC 38E20060
* 065A9380 0000000A
* 00010203 04050A0B
* 0C0D0000 00000000
* E0000000 80008000

Infinite Replays
* 040EB804 60000000

Save Tags in Replays
* 0404B140 38A00000

Stage-Dependent Song Loaders [Oshtoby]

* 28708ceb 00000040
* 4a000000 90180f06
* 14000076 ff00c001
* e0000000 80008000
